Text: DC Tie Languageis the language regarding the DC Tie exemption which will be brought to the RUG for approval at the December th meeting This language is intended to implement the conceptpolicy approved by the RUG at the October rd meeting The attached document is the PIwG Reconciliation Form for PIP from the November rd PIwG meeting I have revised the language shown in the form to reflect comments I received after that meeting which I believe improve what discussed at that meeting Gigem Aggies C Richard Ross American Electric Power ERCOT PIWG Reconciliation DC Tiedoc
